mapper.select:
select t.${dim} from (select ${dim} ,sum(pv) as pv from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}' group by ${dim} order by pv desc limit 1000 offset 0) t
where t.pagetype <>''
limit 1000 offset 0

select count(*) from ( select ${dim} ,sum(pv) as pv from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}' group by ${dim} order by pv desc limit 1000 offset 0 ) t
where t.pagetype <>''

select sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime ,sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount, sum(followingpv) as fpv from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'

select
(CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END)
dt
as showDate, sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime , sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount, sum(followingpv) as fpv from
hotmap_flow_page_hour
hotmap_flow_page_dt
where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and (CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END) >= '${hourFilter}' group by (CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END)
group by dt

select
${dim}
prefixurl
as pageContent, sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime ,sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount,sum(followingpv) as fpv from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and ${dim} in
'${item}'
group by
${dim}
prefixurl
order by ${orderField} desc
limit ${pageSize} offset ${pageStart}

select
${dim} as pageContent,
(CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END) as showDate,
dt as showDate,
sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime ,sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount,sum(followingpv) as fpv from
hotmap_flow_page_hour
hotmap_flow_page_dt
where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and (CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END) >= '${hourFilter}'
and ${dim} in
'${item}'
group by
(CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END)
dt
,${dim}
order by
${dim},
`HOUR`
dt
asc

select referrerprefixurl as pageContent, sum(click) as click,'' as showDate from
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv
where `date` between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and intcmp is not null and intcmp <> '' and referrerprefixurl in
'${item}'
group by referrerprefixurl

select
(CASE WHEN length(`visit_hour`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`visit_hour`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`visit_hour`) END) as showDate,
`date` as showDate,
referrerprefixurl as pageContent,
sum(click) as click from
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv_hour
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv_hour
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv
where `date` between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and intcmp is not null
and (CASE WHEN length(`visit_hour`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`visit_hour`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`visit_hour`) END) >= '${hourFilter}'
and intcmp <> '' and referrerprefixurl in
'${item}'
group by
(CASE WHEN length(`visit_hour`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`visit_hour`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`visit_hour`) END)
dt
,referrerprefixurl
order by
referrerprefixurl ,
visit_hour
`date`
asc

select count(*) from ( select count(1) from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and ${dim} in
'${item}'
group by ${dim} ) t

select sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime , sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount, sum(followingpv) as fpv from hotmap_flow_page_dt where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and ${dim} in
'${item}'

select
(CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END)
dt
as showDate, sum(visitor) as visitor,sum(uv) as uv,sum(pv) as pv,sum(bounces) as bounces,sum(exits) as exits,sum(viewtime) as viewTime , sum(entries) as entries,sum(ordercount) as ordercount,sum(orderamount) as orderamount, sum(followingpv) as fpv from
hotmap_flow_page_hour
hotmap_flow_page_dt
where dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and datasource='${dataSource}'
and (CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END) >= '${hourFilter}'
and ${dim} in
'${item}'
group by
(CASE WHEN length(`HOUR`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`HOUR`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`HOUR`) END)
dt
order by
`HOUR`
dt
asc

select '' as pageContent,
(CASE WHEN length(`visit_hour`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`visit_hour`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`visit_hour`) END) as showDate,
`date` as showDate,
sum(click) as click from
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv_hour
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv_hour
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv
where `date` between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and intcmp is not null and intcmp <>''
and (CASE WHEN length(`visit_hour`) = 2 THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," ",`visit_hour`) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m-%d')," 0",`visit_hour`) END) >= '${hourFilter}'
and referrerprefixurl in
'${item}'
group by
`visit_hour`
`date`
order by
`visit_hour`
`date`
asc

select sum(click) as click from
rpt_hotMap_plus_wap_base_pv
rpt_hotMap_plus_app_base_pv
where `date` between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and intcmp is not null and intcmp <> '' and referrerprefixurl in
'${item}'
